column5: This interdisciplinary programme will focus on a theoretical in-depth, research-based approach to train you as a competent professional in the science of deglutition. You will learn a variety of skills, gain hands-on experience, and develop tools used extensively in clinical, diagnostic, and therapeutic settings related to this expanding field.Find out more about the course content, starting profile, future prospects,... on the programme's websiteVisit the programme websiteÂ
